ygData.subject: Re: [spoiler] Shimmering Orb
ygData.msgSnippet: ... in a large party you won t be dealing a high percentage of the damage, but you will be getting hit an awful lot. with a party of 1 or 2 other people, you d
ygData.messageBody:
> I have a question. Why would a bard want this after dual wield, except
> for money/trade? Is it that we can put it in our range slot?
in a large party you won't be dealing a high percentage of the damage, but
you will be getting hit an awful lot. with a party of 1 or 2 other people,
you'd want to dual wield, past that you might just want to be able to
absorb more damage since your songs are going to attract a lot of hate.

-klamot, bard of fennin ro
